Package org.lrdm.effectors

Class Effector

java.lang.Object
org.lrdm.effectors.Effector
public class Effector extends Object
An effector for the RDM network. Collects requests to change the number of mirrors, links per mirror and topology and triggers these changes at the respective time step.
Author:
Sebastian GÃ¶tz (sebastian.goetz@acm.org)

  • Method Details

    • setMirrors

      public Action setMirrors(int m, int t)
      Specify that at time step t the number of targeted mirrors is to be changed to m.
      Parameters:
      m - number of mirrors
      t - time step when to apply this effect
      Returns:
      an Action representing this adaptation

    • setStrategy

      public TopologyChange setStrategy(TopologyStrategy strategy, int t)
      Specify that at time step t the topology strategy shall be changed to the one given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      strategy - the TopologyStrategy to switch to
      t - the simulation time, when the switch shall happen
      Returns:
      an Action representing this adaptation

    • setTargetLinksPerMirror

      public TargetLinkChange setTargetLinksPerMirror(int numTargetedLinks, int t)
      Specify that at time step t the number of target links per mirror shall be changed to the new value.
      Parameters:
      numTargetedLinks - the new number of target links per mirror
      t - the simulation time, when the switch shall happen
      Returns:
      an Action representing this adapation

    • removeAction

      public void removeAction(Action a)
      Allows to remove an Action queued for execution.
      Parameters:
      a - the Action to remove from the queue

    • timeStep

      public void timeStep(int t)
      Triggers mirror changes at the respective simulation time step.
      Parameters:
      t - current simulation time
